front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Test Code for Switching and Fault Making Tests for High Voltage Interrupter Switches, Interrupters or Interrupting Aids used on or attached to Switches Rated for Alternating Currents Above 1000 Volts.

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Test code for switching (except capacitive current) and fault making tests for switching devices for alternating current, rated above 1000 V and used indoors, outdoors, or in enclosures is specified in this standard.
